title: Yeah, if you could not act like a champ is OP just because the boards hate him, that'd be great
body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/7N4oQKih1Gcfe/giphy.gif
I have never disliked Vayne. Come at me haters.

replies.body: I just find Fiora annoying because she counters my favorite champion. Sion has enough problems damn it.

Fiora is an interesting one. It feels like most Fiora players only play her because "%max health true damage is so OP", and don't actually have any idea how to play the champion. But every once and awhile you actually meet a good Fiora, and you realize that you are not a worthy opponent. 
https://49.media.tumblr.com/932ad2ce382437e1a65fbf501bfea248/tumblr_nto5ipzAUn1ua4k0to1_r3_500.gif

I played her because I thought she was fun.
Now I don't play her as often anymore because I hate people telling me "you won because you played OP champ, flame flame flame".
And I feel bad winning in cheap ways. I'm weird like that.
The trick is to play her, but badly. Nobody flames you for winning in cheap ways if you don't win.
Honestly, I can relate.
Glad I'm not the only one :P
I purposely play Heimerdinger FOR the "you only won because easy champ" sore losers. It's entertaining.
I love Heimerdinger XD
You just like to watch the world burn, don't you?  XD

this is me with {{champion:99}} 
played her before all the buffs, now I feel bad for picking her so I don't.

Same, I love Lux, but it makes me feel like a scumbag if I win games with a favored champ just because the community has distaste about how it is going against her, or similar champs receiving the same kind of hate.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-12T14:22:19.883+0000)
>
> Fiora is an interesting one. It feels like most Fiora players only play her because "%max health true damage is so OP", and don't actually have any idea how to play the champion. But every once and awhile you actually meet a good Fiora, and you realize that you are not a worthy opponent. 
> https://49.media.tumblr.com/932ad2ce382437e1a65fbf501bfea248/tumblr_nto5ipzAUn1ua4k0to1_r3_500.gif

A good Fiora is an abomination to play against for several reasons.

1: You can't run from her. Her Q and E ensure that Fiora is going to fight you regardless of if you want to or not. She's nigh impossible to run away from

2: Her W is pretty ridiculous. Being able to block a CC ability and then turn around and stun YOU with your own ability guarantees that you're gonna lose that trade, or worse, Fiora's gonna realize you just used a CC move and is gonna chase you down and flat out kill you.

3: Tank Fiora is an issue. Because max health True damage, all Fiora needs to kill a squishy is a titanic and her ult. Sure she won't kill a squishy as fast as pure AD Fiora, but she's going to do respectable damage, while being tough to kill herself. And combine this with reasons 1 and 2, and Fiora becomes rather frustrating to play against.

Unless you play Pantheon. Some of my most fun games was as Pantheon vs Fiora. 

We were both on edge with each other. Felt like an actual duel.
Until late game. Then boom you're now falling at 200 mph off the face of the planet.

Thus the biggest reason why I think he needs some changes. No matter what happens, he becomes near useless late game. 

And when you're on a team that refuses to surrender, it becomes a living hell.
You know it bb
{{champion:14}} biggest counter is ritos balance team lol and until their stupidity gets a nerf sion will remain in the gutter Q.Q
{{champion:14}} is only in the gutter if you keep thinking that.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2016-02-12T22:00:40.566+0000)
>
> {{champion:14}} is only in the gutter if you keep thinking that.

He's a strong support at the moment.
But no one will let me play him support!

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=00010002000000020000,timestamp=2016-02-12T22:55:57.983+0000)
>
> But no one will let me play him support!

Don't listed to the haters. They only hate until you get first blood.
My issue is that amazing players like xfioramaster18 make it seem like she has no counterplay.
Try Naut instead, it makes a big difference in that matchup. Plus being able to do 40% max hp true damage with her ult is severely negated by a 18% max hp shield.
I usually play him as a support. Though I've been doing bad at support lately.

Go top with him. With grasp of the undying he's rediculous to fight. I have lost against him with both Fiora and Gnar because he gets so tanky he doesn't give two shits about their damage, and as I said his shield scaling is so high that he can outscale %hp damage.
I may just do that. Hate mobile top laners anyway.
Yeah he's doing pretty well against them in my experience. He gets countered by juggernauts though so I'd be careful when you pick him.

But {{champion:99}} is so op :(
I don't understand :(
I keep walking in her face after her E to let her proc thunderlord for free :(
She has like infinite harrass, her E at rank 5 costs only 130 mana, way too cheap :(
And i always make sure i'm standing still like a statue whenever she uses her Q or her Ult :(
I don't get it, she has ZERO counter play wtf Rito :(

Ah, you forgot the key. Never stand behind minions when fighting Lux. Her Q can hit two whole targets, so there is no point in standing behind a minion wave.
http://i.imgur.com/WZAawn7.gif?Noredirect

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-12T14:16:02.253+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/WZAawn7.gif?Noredirect

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/jadusable/images/0/07/6_-_the_father.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110418110053
My first thought when I saw this GIF.
https://derpicdn.net/img/view/2012/1/6/41__safe_solo_pinkie+pie_animated_screencap_pinkamena+diane+pie_pony_hub+logo_derp_insanity.gif

I would go into how she is not OP.

But I will just stick to the part where you say she is too cheap. Lux has one of the highest spell costs kits in the game. There is as far as I know like 2 others, Malz and Xerath but they have built in sustain to counter it.

A Lux just spamming her E even if she has Unholy is a dumb Lux that will go OOM very fast. If you lose to that then it isn't the champion that is the issue.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/list/000/818/353/ac0.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Shonjl,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-12T15:00:47.104+0000)
>
> I would go into how she is not OP.
> 
> But I will just stick to the part where you say she is too cheap. Lux has one of the highest spell costs kits in the game. There is as far as I know like 2 others, Malz and Xerath but they have built in sustain to counter it.
> 
> A Lux just spamming her E even if she has Unholy is a dumb Lux that will go OOM very fast. If you lose to that then it isn't the champion that is the issue.

My whole comment was just sarcastic since i'm seeing 500 post a day crying about how OP she currently is.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
And the main offender is: Akatsuki Deidara
Haha, i just dont like Quinn because she counters who i play, shes not OP i just dislike playing against her.

This is how I feel about Gnar. I like playing Juggernauts on the top lane, and it is quite hard to kill Gnar with a juggernaut.
http://share.gifyoutube.com/ZR4WK6.gif
You are why I play Gnar, I don't like letting juggernauts enjoy life.

I don't like letting *anybody* enjoy life.

{{champion:25}} I
{{champion:85}} regret
{{champion:127}} nothing.

As a Fizz main, I know this feel all too well.

But now I just sit back and laugh whenever I see a new nerf Fizz thread in Gameplay, knowing that nothing will ever come out of it.
no one thinks fizz is op, we just hate him. playing against one is literally the worst thing in the game

> [{quoted}](name=Snake Town,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-02-12T20:28:20.275+0000)
>
> no one thinks fizz is op, we just hate him. playing against one is literally the worst thing in the game

There are definitely many things far worse than playing against Fizz.
Name one.

Oh that's very easy. I can name a lot more than one if you want:

{{champion:131}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:54}}
{{champion:90}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:96}} (Kog's winrate recently shot up from 45% to 55% and has become extremely oppressive due to recent changes) 
---
The champions I've listed above are ones very often complained about on the Gameplay board. They tend to have a signature move that makes a lot of people upset, ranging from Rengar's ult to Tahm Kench's devour to Soraka's spammy heals to Fiora's ability to be a very sturdy champion while dishing out a very high amount of true damage.

Now I actually don't have a problem with most champions in the game because I understand how League of Legends works, and I know each champion's strengths and weaknesses.

Sure there are some champions that are overwhelming (such as Mr. 57% winrate Udyr), but for the most part nearly all champions are manageable. The reason why people complain about champions is because they refuse to learn how to play against them, and complaining for nerfs on Riot's forum is a lot easier to do than deciding what to do and how to play against them.

_"But winrates don't matter!"_ I hear a lot of people say. This can be true or false depending on certain situations. For example, if a champion's play-rate and win-rate are absurdly high, then you know there's something wrong with them if everyone can play and do very well with said champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WlAWHEYr,comment-id=000c0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-12T21:18:58.763+0000)
>
> Fiora's ability to be a very **_study_** champion while dishing out a very high amount of true damage.

Yeah, pls nerf the headmistress skin.

edit: I jest. I know it was a typo. You meant, a very *studly* champion.

######( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Finally played against a Fizz as Ryze. I usually defend Fizz(cuz I main him) but holy cow crap that was an annoying experience. All I could try to do was land a w and burst him down fast enough before he ed away.

Wait people still complain about Vayne? In S5 she actually had a real reason to be hated due to basically no other good ADC options. It was basically her or Tristana then subpar ADCs(Even Kalista is garbage, only saving grace is she is mobile while every other isn't) but now that she was toned down a little as well as other ADCs actually being good, she is very tamed now.

Most champs that I dislike are usually more because they are annoying than actually OP{{champion:114}}  {{champion:105}}  {{champion:107}} . The only one I would say would actually be OP would be {{champion:223}}  since no tank should be chunking a 3rd of your health no matter the situation. But he got nerfed/balanced so he is a lot more tame now.

Yeah. but all attempts to explain that to people are in Vayne.
